title: The total package! Res Lease in San Marcos. 4 Beds, 3 Baths
posting_body: Tour this superb 4-bedroom, 4 bathroom home in the San Marcos area today!

Everything this lovely home has to offer is for you to enjoy; amazing scenic parks and rivers nearby that are perfect for exercising, and is only a 9 minute drive from down-town San Marcos, with plenty of stores to access nearby.

This beautiful home has spacious rooms that allow in tons of sunlight, and a wonderful living room that features lush carpeted flooring and a ceiling fan to help keep the house cool on those hot Texas days.
This home also has an elegant kitchen with oak wood cabinetry, plenty of counter and storage space, just waiting for your home cook to create some delicious meals.
This home also features a luxurious walk in closet, a washroom with washer and dryer, and a fancy large tub in the primary bath to delight in when it's time to relax.
The fenced backyard is captivating; ample and excellent for hosting friends on the weekends!!!
*Pre-leasing for an August move-in** Tour and apply to this one before it's too late!"
Do NOT reply to this ad, please call/text for a fast response.
Listed By: Benjamin Doherty, Sunroom Rentals Texas, LLC
